description.en: Swedish artillery crew swabs and rams the cannon as sparks flicker from the vent amid drifting smoke.

narration.en: The gun crew works in practiced rhythmâ€”swabbing, ramming, and priming the vent as sparks scatter through the smoke.

info: ActionSquare centered on swabbing, ramming, and vent sparks; anime cel-shading; diffuse Nordic daylight with heavy smoke.
